briefdescription.para: returns 1 if pointer is aligned on size bytes, 0 otherwise

detaileddescription.para: Warn: size must be a power of 2.

briefdescription.para: Returns the vector found at address data.

detaileddescription.para: data must be aligned for the architecture

briefdescription.para: Returns the vector x starting at adress data-1 data must be aligned for the architecture.
Returns the vector x starting at adress data+1, data must be aligned for the architecture.
Returns the vector center and right starting at adress data and data+1 data must be aligned for the architecture.
Returns the vector left and center starting at adress data-1 and data data must be aligned for the architecture.
Returns the vectors left, center and right starting at adress data-1, data and data+1 data must be aligned for the architecture.
Returns the vectors leftleft, left, center and right starting at adress data-2, data-1, data and data+1 data must be aligned for the architecture.
Stores vector x at address data.

detaileddescription.para: data must be aligned for the architecture

memberdef.argsstring: (Simd_template< _TYPE_ > x1, Simd_template< _TYPE_ > x2, Simd_template< _TYPE_ > value_if_x1_lower_than_x2, Simd_template< _TYPE_ > value_otherwise)
memberdef.name: SimdSelect

briefdescription.para: This function performs the following operation on the vectors for (i=0; i<size())

detaileddescription.para: if (x1[i] < x2[i]) result[i] = value_if_x1_lower_than_x2[i] else result[i] = value_otherwise[i]
